acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Bidyut Mandal is present.          Seen the petition filed by the accused Shri Bidyut Mandal praying for transferring the case to the JJB, Diphu, Karbi Anglong on the ground that at the time of occurrence he was 17 years 2 months old. Heard learned lawyers of the both sides. Perused the case record. Also perused the Birth Certificate of the accused Shri Bidyut Mandal. From the Birth Certificate it appears that at the time of occurrence the accused was 17 years 1 month 3 days old. The Birth Certificate submitted was obtained on 12.11.2010. Considering all aspects I find no way to disbelieve the Birth Certificate submitted. Hence I am constrained to hold that at the time of occurrence the accused was a juvenile. Accordingly the case is transferred to the JJB, Diphu, Karbi Anglong and the aforesaid juvenile in conflict of Law is asked to appear before the JJB, Diphu, Karbi Anglong on 16.08.2019. BA is asked to take steps accordingly.

Accused Shri Bidyut Mandal is present. From the Birth Certificate it appears that at the time of occurrence the accused was 17 years 1 month 3 days old. The Birth Certificate submitted was obtained on 12.11.2010. Considering all aspects I find no way to disbelieve the Birth Certificate submitted. Hence I am constrained to hold that at the time of occurrence the accused was a juvenile. Accordingly the case is transferred to the JJB, Diphu, Karbi Anglong and the aforesaid juvenile in conflict of Law is asked to appear before the JJB, Diphu, Karbi Anglong on 16.08.2019.
